languages.text: Воодушевляющая речь Лорд-капитана, транслировавшаяся через {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокс{/g}-систему, вдохновила экипаж. Формирование добровольческих команд для ремонта первичных систем было завершено в срок. Все добровольцы были посмертно восславлены в молитве.

traits.locale_text: Воодушевляющая речь Лорда-Капитана, транслировавшаяся через вокс-систему, вдохновила экипаж. Формирование добровольческих команд для ремонта первичных систем было завершено в срок. Все добровольцы были посмертно восславлены в молитве.

languages.text: The rousing speech from the Lord Captain, which was broadcast over the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-system, inspired the crew, who promptly broke into teams to repair the primary systems. The volunteers, all departed, were later lauded in prayer.
languages.original_text: Воодушевляющая речь Лорд-капитана, транслировавшаяся через {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокс{/g}-систему, вдохновила экипаж. Формирование добровольческих команд для ремонта первичных систем было завершено в срок. Все добровольцы были посмертно восславлены в молитве.

traits.locale_text: The rousing speech from the Lord Captain, which was broadcast over the vox system, inspired the crew, who promptly broke into teams to repair the primary systems. The volunteers, all departed, were later lauded in prayer.

The rousing speech from the Lord Captain, which was broadcast over the vox system, inspired the crew, who promptly broke into teams to repair the primary systems. The volunteers, all departed, were later lauded in prayer.

The rousing speech from the Lord Captain, which was broadcast over the vox system, inspired the crew, who promptly broke into teams to repair the primary systems. The volunteers, all departed, were later lauded in prayer.

The rousing speech from the Lord Captain, which was broadcast over the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-system, inspired the crew, who promptly broke into teams to repair the primary systems. The volunteers, all departed, were later lauded in prayer.

languages.text: La arenga de{mf|l| la} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}, emitida por el sistema de {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voco{/g}, inspiró a la tripulación, que pronto formó equipos para reparar los sistemas principales. Los voluntarios, que murieron durante el proceso, luego fueron alabados en nuestras oraciones.
languages.original_text: The rousing speech from the Lord Captain, which was broadcast over the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-system, inspired the crew, who promptly broke into teams to repair the primary systems. The volunteers, all departed, were later lauded in prayer.

traits.locale_text: La arenga de{mf|l| la} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}, emitida por el sistema de {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voco{/g}, inspiró a la tripulación, que pronto formó equipos para reparar los sistemas principales. Los voluntarios, que murieron durante el proceso, luego fueron alabados en nuestras oraciones.

languages.text: 领主舰长通过{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵{/g}系统发出了振奋人心的讲话，所有船员都受到了鼓舞。他们迅速集结成数个小组，开始修复各个主要系统。那些采取行动的志愿者们，之后在祈祷的过程中得到了褒奖。
languages.original_text: The rousing speech from the Lord Captain, which was broadcast over the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-system, inspired the crew, who promptly broke into teams to repair the primary systems. The volunteers, all departed, were later lauded in prayer.

traits.locale_text: 领主舰长通过{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵{/g}系统发出了振奋人心的讲话，所有船员都受到了鼓舞。他们迅速集结成数个小组，开始修复各个主要系统。那些采取行动的志愿者们，之后在祈祷的过程中得到了褒奖。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクス{/g}システムで放送されたロード・キャプテンの高揚させる演説はクルー達を鼓舞し、すぐさまチームに分かれて主要システムの修復に取り掛からせた。志願者達は、すべてが去った後に、祈りの中で称賛された。
languages.original_text: The rousing speech from the Lord Captain, which was broadcast over the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-system, inspired the crew, who promptly broke into teams to repair the primary systems. The volunteers, all departed, were later lauded in prayer.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクス{/g}システムで放送されたロード・キャプテンの高揚させる演説はクルー達を鼓舞し、すぐさまチームに分かれて主要システムの修復に取り掛からせた。志願者達は、すべてが去った後に、祈りの中で称賛された。

languages.text: Die mitreißende Rede des Lord Captains, die über das {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Vox{/g}-System übertragen wurde, inspirierte die Besatzung, die sich sofort in Teams aufteilte, um die Primärsysteme zu reparieren. Die Freiwilligen, die allesamt starben, wurden später im Gebet gelobt.
languages.original_text: The rousing speech from the Lord Captain, which was broadcast over the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-system, inspired the crew, who promptly broke into teams to repair the primary systems. The volunteers, all departed, were later lauded in prayer.

languages.text: Le vibrant discours {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}, diffusé sur le {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}système-vox{/g}, a galvanisé l'équipage, qui s'est rapidement organisé pour réparer les circuits principaux. Les volontaires, tous disparus, ont été célébrés dans la prière.
languages.original_text: The rousing speech from the Lord Captain, which was broadcast over the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-system, inspired the crew, who promptly broke into teams to repair the primary systems. The volunteers, all departed, were later lauded in prayer.

traits.locale_text: Le vibrant discours {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}, diffusé sur le {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}système-vox{/g}, a galvanisé l'équipage, qui s'est rapidement organisé pour réparer les circuits principaux. Les volontaires, tous disparus, ont été célébrés dans la prière.

languages.text: Lord Kaptan'ın {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voks{/g} sisteminden yayınlanan yüreklendirici konuşması, mürettebata ilham vererek kısa süre içinde ekiplere ayrılıp ana sistemlerin onarımına başlamalarını sağladı. Tamamı vefat eden gönüllüler daha sonra dualarla anıldılar.
languages.original_text: The rousing speech from the Lord Captain, which was broadcast over the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-system, inspired the crew, who promptly broke into teams to repair the primary systems. The volunteers, all departed, were later lauded in prayer.

traits.locale_text: Lord Kaptan'ın {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voks{/g} sisteminden yayınlanan cesaret verici konuşması, mürettebata ilham vererek kısa süre içinde ekiplere ayrılıp birincil sistemlerin onarımına başlamalarını sağladı. Tamamı ölen gönüllülere daha sonra dualar eşliğinde methiyeler dizildi.
